data.title: King Bhumibol of Thailand, Longest-Reigning Monarch, Dies at 88
data.meta_description: King Bhumibol Adulyadej of Thailand, an American-born monarch whose reign lasted seven decades and captivated a nation, has died. He was 88.
data.text:
Reign encompassed ten military coups, most recently in 2014

King revered for transforming monarchy into moral authority

King Bhumibol Adulyadej of Thailand, an American-born monarch whose reign lasted seven decades and captivated a nation, has died. He was 88.

Bhumibol died peacefully on Thursday at 3:52 p.m. at Bangkokâ€™s Siriraj Hospital, the royal palace said in a statement.
